alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 1:47PM MST until January 26 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 17 inches possible. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highway 14 through Burgess Junction. Backcountry activity will be impacted by snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
